tests.desc: A collection of URL test cases, compiled from Webkit's /fast/url tests, Julian Reschke, and other sources.

test.name: A U+0020 space in the fragment
Illegal Unicode U+FDD0 in the fragment
An extra U+0023 NUMBER SIGN in middle of the fragment
An extra U+0023 NUMBER SIGN at the start of fragment

group.name: normalization
group.desc: Test cases for normalization behaviors - see http://www.unicode.org/reports/tr15/ Figure 6 and RFC3987

test.name: Test if delimeters such as "?" are unencoded
Test if delimeters such as "/" are unencoded
Test if entire string is unencoded
Test if authority and port gets unencoded
